movies.title: A zivot jde dál
movies.plot: On the coast of Yugoslavia lives fisherman Ivo Kralj, his wife Marie, son Vuk, and Ivo's mother in one happy home. Marie, who loves her husband and always looks forward to his return from sea, attracts Nikola, with whom Ivo, out of jealousy, has a scuffle at a dance. After the outbreak of World War I Ivo is mobilized. He ends up in a P.O.W. camp where he is subjected to hard labour. His family then receives news of his death. The years pass and the lonely widow Marie is occasionally visited by her friend Nikola. Ivo's mother would like her to remarry. Soon after the wedding Marie becomes pregnant. Ivo, who has been thought dead, succeeds in escaping the P.O.W. camp where he has spent several years. Upon his arrival home he finds his name on a memorial erected to the victims of the war...
movies.simplePlot: On the coast of Yugoslavia lives fisherman Ivo Kralj, his wife Marie, son Vuk, and Ivo's mother in one happy home. Marie, who loves her husband and always looks forward to his return from ...

biography.placeOfBirth: Prague, Bohemia, Austria-Hungary [now Prague, Czech Republic]
biography.bio: Ladislav H. Struna was born on June 27, 1899 in Prague, Bohemia, Austria-Hungary as Ladislav Herbert Struna. He was an actor, known for A zivot jde dál (1935), Du samedi au dimanche (1931) and Les hommes sans ailes (1946). He died on February 14, 1980 in Prague, Czechoslovakia.
biography.name: Ladislav H. Struna

biography.bio: Ita Rina was born on July 7, 1907 in Divaca, Austria-Hungary as Italina Ida Kravanja. She was an actress, known for Seduction (1929), Tonischka (1930) and A zivot jde dál (1935). She died on May 10, 1979 in Budva, Montenegro, Yugoslavia.
biography.name: Ita Rina

biography.bio: Zlata Dryáková is an actress, known for A zivot jde dál (1935) and Zivot tece dalje (1933).
biography.name: Zlata Dryáková

biography.bio: Zvonimir Rogoz was born on October 10, 1887 in Zagreb, Austria-Hungary. He was an actor, known for Ecstasy (1933), Muz z neznáma (1939) and A zivot jde dál (1935). He died on February 6, 1988 in Zagreb, Croatia, Yugoslavia.
biography.name: Zvonimir Rogoz

biography.bio: Jaroslav Bráska was born on April 3, 1880 in Prague, Bohemia, Austria-Hungary as Jaroslav Zavadil. He was an actor, known for A zivot jde dál (1935), Workers, Let's Go (1934) and Sedmá velmoc (1933). He died on June 2, 1950 in Prague, Czechoslovakia.
biography.name: Jaroslav Bráska

biography.bio: F.X. Mlejnek was born on April 10, 1907 in Prague, Bohemia, Austria-Hungary as Frantisek Xaverius Mlejnek. He was an actor, known for A zivot jde dál (1935), Du samedi au dimanche (1931) and Reka (1933). He died on January 20, 1965 in Prague, Czechoslovakia.
biography.name: F.X. Mlejnek

biography.bio: Bohdan Lachman was born in 1866. He was an actor, known for A zivot jde dál (1935), Reka (1933) and Poslední muz (1934). He died in 1942.
biography.name: Bohdan Lachman

biography.bio: Miroslav Svoboda was born on May 3, 1910 in Prague, Bohemia, Austria-Hungary. He was an actor and assistant director, known for Roméo, Juliette et les ténèbres (1960), Workers, Let's Go (1934) and Pred maturitou (1932). He died on December 17, 1988 in Prague, Czechoslovakia.
biography.name: Miroslav Svoboda

biography.bio: Zdenek Gina Hasler was born on October 31, 1909 in Prague, Austria-Hungary as Zdenek Milos Hasler. He was an actor and director, known for A zivot jde dál (1935), Svátek veritelu (1939) and Za tichych noci (1941). He died on November 11, 1972 in Santa Monica, California, USA.
biography.name: Zdenek Gina Hasler

biography.bio: Jaroslav Tryzna was born in 1901. He was an actor, known for A zivot jde dál (1935), The World Is Ours (1937) and The Accordion (1937). He died in 1966.
biography.name: Jaroslav Tryzna

biography.bio: Josef Bunzl was born on July 27, 1887 in Prague, Bohemia, Austria-Hungary. He was an actor, known for A zivot jde dál (1935), Homunculus (1916) and Holzapfel weiß alles (1932). He died on January 3, 1937 in Prague, Czechoslovakia.
biography.name: Josef Bunzl

biography.bio: Antonín Fric was born on March 10, 1886 in Prague, Bohemia, Austria-Hungary. He was an actor, known for Sest musketýru (1925), A zivot jde dál (1935) and Dobrý voják Svejk (1931). He died on April 5, 1956 in Prague, Czechoslovakia.
biography.name: Antonín Fric

biography.bio: Vekoslav Satoria is an actor, known for A zivot jde dál (1935), Reka (1933) and The Heroic Captain Korkorán (1934).
biography.name: Vekoslav Satoria

biography.bio: Joca Popovic is an actor, known for A zivot jde dál (1935).
biography.name: Joca Popovic

biography.bio: Frank Rose-Ruzicka was born on January 12, 1896 in Prague, Bohemia, Austria-Hungary [now Czech Republic] as Frantisek Ruzicka. He was an actor, known for Román boxera (1921), A zivot jde dál (1935) and Battalion (1937).
biography.name: Frank Rose-Ruzicka
